message.body: Hey, Cashew. How's it going?
Hi Edward
good how are you?
Doing all right. Hoping this good weather keeps up for a bit before the storm moves in.
is it gonna storm today?
feels like it will be hot and muggy
It's supposed to storm this evening and into tomorrow
if you look at the radar image
(radar.weather.gov)
you can see a storm coming in over the midwest right now
I hope there's thunder and lightning
shouldn't have left all my windows open tho, i guess
there's a little tail that might hit us later this evening, and then a mass coming up from a little farther south
You'll probably be able to get home before it gets crazy
are you gonna take storm pics?
I remember you telling me about that last summer
I think I'm good on storm footage for a little while.
That is the reason that I started paying too much attention to storms on the radar image, though
But now I'm more interested in, "will I get soaked on the way home"
did you ride your bike?
or maybe, "what's the best time to go on my bike ride?"
I did
I've been riding to work or the lab recently so I can go straight to the exercise ride on the way home
It seems the forcast always says things will happen a little earlier than they actuallly fo
*do
yeah, they tend to over predict the window of storm activity
but if you keep checking on the hourly forecast, they'll continuously shrink it
so it gets more accurate as it nears or is happening
